Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring immediately after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to all completed reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' appears in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Frequency of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' is followed by a resubmission ('Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE') within the same case
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring in domestic trip reimbursement requests (inferred from absence of pre-approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events associated with claims filed more than two months after the trip (based on case-level timing patterns inferred from variant structure)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and ending with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' without any subsequent resubmission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in cases that do not involve a budget owner approval step
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that occur as the final activity in a case, indicating abandoned reimbursement attempts
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of process variants where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to the total number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' executions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' compared to the total occurrences of all rejection activities (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in 2018 (university-wide data) compared to 2017 (two departments only), inferred from case distribution across years
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in variants that skip 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' or 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities
